name: IMMZ.DT.10.HPV
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give HPV vaccine according to the defined schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for HPV - No Doses
action.description: Provide HPV immunizations - using the "HPV vaccine immunization - NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Patient Age" >= "9 years" or "Patient Age" <= "14 years" and "HPV vaccine history" = "No-doses"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate Patient for HPV because no doses on a two-dose schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for HPV - One Dose
action.description: Provide HPV immunizations - using "HPV vaccine immunization - ONE PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Patient Age" >= "9 years" or "Patient Age" <= "14 years" and "HPV vaccine history" = "One-dose" and "6-12 months after initial dose"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate Patient for HPV a second time on a two-dose schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for HPV - Two Doses
action.description: Provide additional HPV immunizations - using "HPV vaccination immunization - ONE PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Patient Age" >= "9 years" or "Patient Age" <= "14 years" and "HPV vaccine history" = "One-dose" and "Interval between first and second dose shorter than 5 months" and "at least six months after intitial dose"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate Patient for HPV a third time due to short interval between first and second dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for HPV - No Doses
action.description: Provide HPV immunizations - using the "HPV vaccine immunization - NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate Patient for HPV because no doses on a three-dose schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for HPV - One Dose
action.description: Provide HPV immunizations - using the "HPV vaccine immunization -  ONE PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate Patient for HPV because one dose on a three-dose schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for HPV - Two Doses
action.description: Provide HPV immunizations - using the "HPV vaccine immunization -  TWO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate Patient for HPV because two doses on a three-dose schedule
